sentences.sContent: Many candidates go into interviews and are keen to emphasise their skills.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many candidates go into interviews and are keen to emphasise their skills.
sentences.sCn: 在面试中，更多的候选人倾向于强调他们的专业技能。

sentences.sContent: They emphasise the significance of economic stability and social equality.
sentences.sContent_eng: They emphasise the significance of economic stability and social equality.
sentences.sCn: 他们强调了经济稳定、社会平等的重要性。

remMethod.val: em+phasise(看作phrase， 短语)→用短语加强→强调
